title: Since Release 1607 3rd pty bitmap fonts stopped working in console windows
body:
Since Release 1607 3rd pty bitmap fonts stopped working in console windows. In the settings dialog the additional sizes are listed and the preview shows them correctly but in the actual console windows only the build-in bitmap fonts are used. Still worked in 1511.
This is the case at least with my fonts which worked fine since Windows 95. They have the OEM flag and the face name is Terminal.
http://www.uwe-sieber.de/dosfon_e.html#download
